name: typescript-ast-query-editor
description: TypeScript AST viewer and Advance Query editor

scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.build-dev-no-maps: export NODE_ENV=development ; parcel build src/index.html -d docs  --no-minify --no-content-hash  --no-source-maps
scripts.build-dev: export NODE_ENV=development ; parcel build src/index.html -d docs  --no-minify --no-content-hash
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && export NODE_ENV=production && sh build-workers.sh && parcel build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --no-source-maps --public-url './' && rm -rf ../../demos/docs/cannabis/typescript-ast-query-editor/* && mv docs/* ../../demos/docs/cannabis/typescript-ast-query-editor/
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
